artist.name: Jeremey Loops
artist.writeup: Jeremy Loops aint no traditional 'band', creating music on the spot with that there loopdaloop pedal. Various artists also join him for free jam sessions & the music they create is all original. it'll definitely make ya dance like a hick!

artist.name: Matthew Mole
artist.writeup: I'm not that good at speaking, so bare with me here. Music is my second nature. It takes up a lot of my time, it drives me, it makes me who I am.

artist.name: Prime Circle
artist.writeup: Prime Circle is a South African rock band success story. They’ve gone from a rehearsal room in the small town of Witbank, to one of South Africa’s most popular bands. They formed in 2001.
